name: The Temple (FFS)
description:
Please note: This game is in Alpha

Breathe. In. Out.

Again. In. Out.

Take control of yourself with this meditative experience. Move with the metronome, sweep the leaves, eat, rest, repeat.

And breathe. Slowly. Calmly. Deeply.

This game is designed to make life slow down, make troubles appear less, and make sweeping leaves a calm and relaxing experience.
